name: address
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool address_correction_and_geocoding.
Tool description: Postal Address Correction, Validation, Standardization and Geocoding
API description: Sends a request to an address correction and geocoding API using the provided address lines and API key.

addressline1.description: The first line of the address.

addressline2.description: The second line of the address, typically including city, state, and zip code.
